document_data.name: Amphora
document_data.mainbody:
'''Amphoras''' ({{variant|amphorae|alt=yes}}{{Cite web/Candlekeep forum/Questions for Ed Greenwood (2007)/Winemaking in the Realms}}

[[File:Minotaur undressed.png|thumb|''An unarmored [[minotaur]] holds an amphora, letting its contents drip out on to the floor.''|465x465px]]
document_data.Description: Amphoras had narrow necks and two handles. They were often made of clay.
document_data.Usage: On the [[Upper Planes]], some [[evil]] fishermen were known to enspell amphorae with ''[[darkness]]'' so they could capture [[asrai]] and sell them to creatures of the [[Lower Planes]], such as [[hydroloth]]s, [[marraenoloth]]s, and [[slaadi]].<ref>
document_data.Notable Owners:
* Amphoras full of wine could be found in the markets of [[Memnon]].
* [[Teneth's]], a [[festhall]] and temple of [[Sune]] in [[Cormyr]], had amphoras within it.
* Amphoras could be found in the [[Underdark]] city of [[Ust Nastha]], used by servants in the [[Female Fighters' Society]] to fill baths.<ref>
